Uses of Package
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions

  • Packages that use com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions
    This package contains all Exceptions that may be thrown at different times within NetCom2.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces
    This package contains interfaces, that are relevant for both the server and the client package.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Server.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients
    This is the core package for Communication.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.comm
    This Package is associated with the Communication between the ClientStart and the ServerStart.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions 
    Class and Description
    NetComException
    This Exception is the super-Exception for any non-runtime Exception within NetCom2.
    NetComRuntimeException
    Any Exception, that is not declared in any interface within NetCom2 is a sub-class of this Exception.
    RemoteRequestException
    This Exception-type is thrown, whenever an RMI request failed for any reason.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    StartFailedException
    This Exception will be thrown, if the Start of the ServerStart or the ClientStart fails.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server 
    Class and Description
    ClientConnectionFailedException
    This Exception signals that the internal creation of an Client, based upon a Socket, failed.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients 
    Class and Description
    DeSerializationFailedException
    This Exception shows that the deserialization of some Object failed.
    SerializationFailedException
    This Exception will be thrown if Serialization fails.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.exceptions used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.comm 
    Class and Description
    CommunicationNotSpecifiedException
    This Exception signals that the CommunicationRegistration has no provided OnReceive provided for the provided Class.
